# ChatGPT-Exportify
These are two scripts that export ChatGPT conversations from a browser - this is particularly useful with temporary conversations where content needs to be saved for later.  Further testing is needed, but it mostly works.

## Bookmarklet
Create a bookmark with this url:
```
javascript:void(function(){var code=atob("");var blob=new Blob([code],{type:"application/javascript"});var url=URL.createObjectURL(blob);var s=document.createElement("script");s.src=url;document.head.appendChild(s);s.remove();URL.revokeObjectURL(url)}())
```

## Paste Script In Console
This script effectively clicks all the copy buttons to get the markdown exactly as ChatGPT copies it.  This is found in [chatgpt-exportify.js](chatgpt-exportify.js).  Just select all and paste into the F12 Console.
